column2: Can you give a specific example of how generative AI will help one of your customers? What exactly is the revenue model?

column1: Market partnerships with Microsoft, Amazon, Google (Alphabet)
column2: You promote your partnerships with these leading companies, but do you pay them or do they pay you? Please elaborate on the terms of the relationships.
You claim to be able to turn cash flow positive, but the market doesn’t believe you. What exactly is the path to stop the substantial cash burn?
You made the claim this week that AI’s stock price is undervalued. Why hasn’t the Company recently used the stock buyback program and why no insider buys?
